InstructionData.Title: Temperature Reader
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Temperature Reader 1.1​ alias Sensor d0​ alias Bias d1​ alias temperature r0​ alias bias r1​ alias kelvin r2​ move kelvin 0​ start:​ l temperature Sensor Temperature​ l bias Bias Setting​ add temperature temperature bias​ bgtz kelvin set​ sub temperature temperature 273.15​ set:​ s db Setting temperature​ yield​ j start
